title: Dental Health
question_text: Which of the following situations deal with sample proportions?

choices.text: Survey $10$ subjects, record how many brush their teeth daily.
Survey $10$ subjects, record the number of cavities they have.
Survey $10$ subjects, record the percent who brush their teeth daily.
Survey subjects until you have found one who does not brush their teeth daily.
None of the responses are correct since $10$ subjects is too small a sample size for sample proportions.
